Name: bouletic
Description: the set of relevant possibilities is a set of desires of some agent or group of agents

Name: circumstantial
Description: the set of relevant possibilities is a set of circumstances held in w

Name: deontic
Description: the set of relevant possibilities is a set of rules in force of some agent or group of agents

Name: epistemic
Description: the set of relevant possibilities is a set of facts known to some agent or group of agents
